channel.title: Project king c r 0 w n v1!
channel.description:
Hello , I am king c r 0 w n and I am going to start a project. There will be a lot to add to the server to improve it but that will be easy if all of us work together. My server is basically Project 16 but we're going to make it into something new. Things I want to add : PC , CWARS , Specails , Double shooting ogre comp , and that's all I got for now. What I have added : Redmask+dmed to make a D Full - creds to frugoo scape , adding all animations for the mage attacks, made all rares rare , took out the stupid ::bomb command.There will be a lot of spots open which will be : Website maker , tester , admin , mod , website designer , idea maker , coders , and even client coders.
Site : Still not made Forum : Frugoo is making pmg?!
Percent done with server : 10 % Will be updated time to time.
Admin - Will be a loyal player to play the server to see if anyone is abusing their power or if anyone is breaking rules [may kick and ban if need]
Moderator - Will do the same as administator but no banning ^.^
Tester - After a coder has made a code and I have added it 100 percent correctly they will test if the code works.
Idea Maker - Will make idea's for the coder to make. All idea's must be approved by me - doesn't matter if it's on msn , over the game , in pm , just has to be accepted.
Website Maker - Will make a forums for the server and will make it all sexy looking xD
Website Designer - Will add on the forums - backrounds , logos , ect.
Coders - Must be experienced and know what your doing or else we're screwed
Client Maker - makes a client for the server to run on
How to get a job?Here is the form :
Username : [you can leave your real name if you want ] What job do you want : Why do you want this job? : What will you do with your job/powers ? : How mature are you ? : Are you experienced in any way? : Accept [ ] Decline [ ]
Level of experience Amateur Level 1 Little Exp Level 2 Good With What your doing Level 3 Experienced lvl 4 Know what your doing Level 5 Master coder Level 6 Legendary Level Level 7
[center] [Admin spots] [Sick Of Air] [Frugoo Scape] [open]
Mod spots [open] [open] [open]
Tester [open] [open]
Website Maker [Open]
Website Designer [Open] [Open]
Client Coder [Open] [Open] PS : Work together client coders you'll need the team effort.
Idea makers [open] [open] [open] [open]
Coders [Frugoo Scape] [open] [open] [open] [open][/center]
Have fun joining and I hope no flaming :)

item.title: Project king c r 0 w n v1!
item.dc:creator: @King_C_R_0_W_N King C R 0 W N
item.description:
@King_C_R_0_W_N wrote:

Hello , I am king c r 0 w n and I am going to start a project. There will be a lot to add to the server to improve it but that will be easy if all of us work together. My server is basically Project 16 but we’re going to make it into something new. Things I want to add : PC , CWARS , Specails , Double shooting ogre comp , and that’s all I got for now. Forum : Frugoo is making pmg?!

Percent done with server : 10 % Will be updated time to time.

Admin - Will be a loyal player to play the server to see if anyone is abusing their power or if anyone is breaking rules [may kick and ban if need]

Idea Maker - Will make idea’s for the coder to make. All idea’s must be approved by me - doesn’t matter if it’s on msn , over the game , in pm , just has to be accepted.

Coders - Must be experienced and know what your doing or else we’re screwed
